lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 1 -- The British authorities had no recent official information from Bulgaria today, but professed to be not particularly concerned. The British are quite ready to believe the reports that armed uniformed Germans are actually in Bulgaria but they have left in the hands of the British Minister in Sofia.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
